alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Newton; Scott; Smith (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 12:30PM CDT until July 13 at 1:30PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Jasper County in east central Mississippi... Southern Newton County in east central Mississippi... Northeastern Smith County in central Mississippi... Southeastern Scott County in central Mississippi... * Until 130 PM CDT. * At 1230 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lake to near Roberts to near Rose Hill, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Roberts and Garlandville around 1235 PM CDT. Rose Hill around 1245 PM CDT. Montrose and Orange around 1255 PM CDT. Louin and Paulding around 105 PM CDT. Pineville and Turnerville around 110 PM CDT. Bay Springs around 120 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
